articles.title: Doctors' warning after man tears hole in throat trying to stop sneeze - BBC.com
articles.description: The patient was taken to hospital in severe pain after he pinched his nose and closed his mouth.
articles.content:
Hospital scans revealed a 2mm perforation in his windpipe.
Doctors have issued a warning after a man tore a hole in his throat while trying to stop a sneeze.
